author: jwoolley
msg: Reading a file bucket bigger than APR_MMAP_LIMIT (4MB) now yields
a string of 4MB mmap buckets, rather than a string of 8KB heap buckets
plus a 4MB mmap bucket.  To accomodate this, the mmap bucket destroy
function explicitly deletes the apr_mmap_t after last reference
to avoid having too much of a large file mapped at once if possible.
This was made possible by the newly-added "owner" logic in the APR mmap
code.

author: trawick
msg: improve the way we keep gen_uri_delims.lo out of libaprutil.la
old way:       remove the object file when we're done linking
gen_uri_delims
problem:       we continually rebuild apr-util since we want to
build gen_uri_delims.lo
new way:       prune gen_uri_delims.lo from the list of files
added to libaprutil.la
